headline: Coinbase’s Armstrong still sees path for US crypto legislation
summary: Investing.com -- Coinbase Global Inc. CEO Brian Armstrong remains optimistic about comprehensive U.S. crypto legislation despite helping to derail a bill last week before it reached a Senate committee.

headline: Why Coinbase (COIN) Stock Is Down Today
summary: Shares of blockchain infrastructure company Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) fell 4.4% in the afternoon session after the U.S. announced potential tariffs on several European countries.

raw.headline: Why Coinbase (COIN) Stock Is Down Today

headline: Crypto: Why the CLARITY Act may be riding on stablecoin interest
summary: The Senate Banking Committee cancelled its markup of the US CLARITY Act last week after Coinbase Global (COIN) CEO Brian Armstrong withdrew his support of the crypto regulation bill, essentially leaving the bill in legislative limbo. Benchmark Company managing director and senior research analyst Mark Palmer joins Market Catalysts to speak with Julie Hyman about what the bill's future may end up hinging on: stablecoin yields. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Strategy Plunges 59% in 6 Months: Should You Hold or Fold the Stock?
summary: MSTR stock slumps 59% in six months as Bitcoin volatility, premium valuation and $17.44B unrealized losses weigh, even as long-term growth drivers persist.

headline: Bitcoin, U.S. Dollar Skid, Gold Rallies On 'Sell America' Trade
summary: U.S. dollar, bitcoin, cryptos fall as President Trump escalates tensions with NATO allies over Greenland control. Gold, silver rally.

headline: Coinbase Launches NBA Rookie Firsts Content Series Spotlighting the Next Generation of NBA Stars and the Future of Money
summary: Coinbase, the leading publicly listed digital assets company building the future of money, today announced the launch of NBA Rookie Firsts, a premium four-part content series spotlighting the next generation of NBA stars as they step into the league and help shape its future.

headline: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong on crypto regulation: Banks should compete on a level playing field
summary: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss the future of crypto regulation, why he withdrew support from the Senate market structure bill, top 3 issues with the bill, future of crypto vs. big banks, and more.
